title: Getting better (A)
creator_credit: Yuri Sokol, Larry Lucas, Michael Le Moignan, Australian Film Commission and Corroboree Films
brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “Black futures (A)”.
The life expectancy of Australian Aborigines is twenty years less than white life expectancy. But things are changing. Aboriginal people are taking control of their own health care. They are trying to combine the best elements of Western medicine with traditional remedies.
creator_credit_for_label: Yuri Sokol, Larry Lucas, Michael Le Moignan, Australian Film Commission and Corroboree Films
